content: yarn light 3 - white and gray cotton thread in black materials 3 25 mm crochet hook poly filling dimension 9 5 x 7 5 abbreviations magic_ring magic_ring stitch st slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet bubble stitch dc6tog fasten_off f/o skill level intermediate seamlessy color change work in the color a until two loops of the last stitch remain on the hook use the color b to complete the stitch bubble stitch work each st to the last loop but leave the last loop on the hook while you are working the rest of the stitches in the bobble then yarn over and draw a loop through all the loops on the hook to complete the stitch
